passages.text:
You are standing in what appears to be a desert of some sort, the sky is white and the air clear, three shadows are moving on the ground but the source of which the shadow comes from is unknown, they move in a very timely manor.

[[Go East->East]] 
[[Go West->West]]
[[Go North->North]]
[[Go South->South]]
passages.name: The Beginning

passages.text:
Heading east you feel younger as thought you were feeling how you felt only a quarter of a life ago.

[[Go Back->The Beginning]]
passages.name: East

passages.text:
As you walk farther west you feel yourself grow tired, annoyed, and overall angry, as you feel like you've wasted enough time walking this directions you stop.

[[Go Back ->The Beginning]]
passages.name: West

passages.text:
You feel yourself get closer to the ground as you walk farther North, you are beginning to forget some how to walk correctly, but just before you walk too far, the shadow catches your eye and you stop.

[[Go Back ->The Beginning]]
passages.name: North

passages.text:
You walk a bit and nothing seems to change, the shadows pass over you slowly, methodically...

[[Go Back ->The Beginning]]
passages.name: South
